meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Linda Christiano Burton Boxerman Chris Walkey Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #610.

div.div: J! round & first 7 clues of DJ! round only.

td.p: Linda Christiano, a teacher from Alto Loma, California
Burton Boxerman, a retired teacher from St. Louis, Missouri
Chris Walkey, a jeweler originally from Boston, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,000)

tr.td: MICE
SHIPS
ODD JOBS
FACTS & FIGURES
BASEBALL
SUMMER SONGS
